platform.title: AnalytiQ Platform Features
platform.subtitle: Comprehensive analytics solutions specifically developed for the banking sector

f1.title: Integrated Data Warehouse
f1.desc: Consolidate all your data sources in one central location. Automatically integrate data from different systems and prepare it for analysis.

f2.title: ETL Processes
f2.desc: Automate data extraction, transformation, and loading operations. Easily manage complex data flows with a visual interface.

f3.title: Smart Variable Selection
f3.desc: Automatically identify variables with the highest predictive power from tens of thousands of options using AI-powered intelligent variable selection.

f4.title: Model Development
f4.desc: Rapid model development with AutoML capabilities. Multiple algorithm support, automatic hyperparameter optimization, and model comparison tools.

f5.title: Model Deployment
f5.desc: Deploy your developed models to production with a single click. Secure deployment with API integration, versioning, and monitoring features.

f6.title: BI and Reporting
f6.desc: Create interactive dashboards with comprehensive visualization tools. Accelerate your decision-making processes with customizable reports and automated notifications.

f1.title: Patented Technology
f1.desc: High performance and low cost with patented technologies used in data processing and analysis processes.

f2.title: 3-Year R&D
f2.desc: Solution specifically optimized for the banking sector as a result of 3-year R&D collaboration with KKB.

f3.title: No Third-Party Dependencies
f3.desc: Full control and flexibility with domestic technology that minimizes external dependencies.

f4.title: AutoML Capabilities
f4.desc: Reduces the need for expert staff and accelerates the development process with automatic model development features. Corporate memory and model documentation remain secure within the organization.

level1.title: KKB Level 1 Variables
level1.subtitle: Basic Variables
level1.desc: Customer demographic information and basic account data
level1.f1: Demographic information such as age, gender, occupation
level1.f2: Account opening date and account type
level1.f3: Geographic information such as city, district

level2.title: KKB Level 2 Variables
level2.subtitle: Transactional Variables
level2.desc: Customer transaction history and behavioral data
level2.f1: Monthly average transaction count and amount

level5.title: Complex Variables
level5.subtitle: External Data Sources
level5.desc: Third-party data and alternative data sources
level5.f1: Credit bureau score and debt information
